tasks.label: remove-next-lock
args: Remove-Item -Force "C:\Users\rimvy\yakiwood-website\.next\lock" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if (Test-Path "C:\Users\rimvy\yakiwood-website\.next\lock") { Write-Error "lock still exists"; exit 1 } else { Write-Output "lock removed" }

tasks.label: kill-node-next
args: taskkill /F /IM node.exe /T 2>$null; taskkill /F /IM npm.exe /T 2>$null; taskkill /F /IM next.exe /T 2>$null; Write-Output "killed"

tasks.label: clean-next
args: $p="C:\Users\rimvy\yakiwood-website\.next"; if (Test-Path $p) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $p -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 200; if (Test-Path $p) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $p -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; if (Test-Path $p) { Write-Output ".next still exists"; exit 1 } else { Write-Output ".next removed" }

tasks.label: clean-next-verbose
args: $p="C:\Users\rimvy\yakiwood-website\.next"; if (!(Test-Path $p)) { Write-Output ".next does not exist"; exit 0 }; try { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $p -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Output ("remove failed: " + $_.Exception.Message) }; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 300; if (Test-Path $p) { Write-Output ".next still exists"; Get-ChildItem -LiteralPath $p -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 30 | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName }; exit 1 } else { Write-Output ".next removed" }

tasks.label: list-node-next-procs
args: Get-Process node,npm,next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Name,Id,Path | Format-Table -AutoSize | Out-String -Width 200
